scenario_text.value: Whew! Ha, see that? See how tough we are?!

Thanks Takuma, you really pulled my butt out
of the fire there!
Indeed. I share his gratitude.
You’re very welcome!
I’m glad the two of you are safe.

That illusion you mentioned... Did a fake
Falcomon appear to you, Minoru?

Yeah! He had a real mouth on him, so we ended
up throwing down.

When I saw him arguing with my doppelgänger,
I was certainly taken aback...
Ahaha...

Right, and that’s when the real Falcomon
showed up.

Still, they both looked the same, and even
talked the same.

But in the end, I chose the right one! A good
guess, if I do say so myself.
A guess?!
You mean to say that was dumb luck...?
It ain’t dumb if it works, right?

Real talk, I was more convinced by the fake!
Ahaha!

It, it cannot be... You couldn’t tell the
difference, Minoru...?
Fa, Falcomon...?

Sit down, you lout! Have you any idea how
worried I was about you?!

Yowww! What was that for?! I picked the right
one, didn’t I?!

(That’s Minoru for you. Still, gotta feel
a little bad for Falcomon...)

You’re a piece of work... Gotta give your boy
there a bit more respect, yeah?

Ryo, Kunemon! Thank goodness, you guys are
okay, too!
Yeah, not much happened on our end.

A bunch of fake Kunemon showed up. The real
one here was with them, so we joined up.
Wait, you could tell it apart from the fakes?!

Kinda? I couldn’t understand what the others
were saying, just the real one, so.
Kewkewww!

Ohh, I get it. So that’s what you mean by
“feeling connected,” huh?

Look! Observe! Ryo and Kunemon are so
connected, and yet you...!

Aw come on! They’re them, and we’re us, ain’t
we?!

Uh, well at least you guys got back together
in the end. That’s good, right?
Hey, Takuma!

Whoa! Oh, it’s you, Kaito. Glad to see you
guys are fine.

Who cares about me! What about Miu? You seen
her anywhere?!

He’s been like this the whole time. You gotta
do something, Takuma.
C-calm down, Kaito! Miu is just—
Sick of my brother’s freak-outs?
Miu?!
Oh, thank gawd... I was so freaking worried!

You’re so damn annoying! Stay on your side of
the cave!

Heheh, it’s not like you weren’t worried
about him either, Miu.
I, I wasn’t!
Everyone! You found each other!
Oh man, what a relief...

Oh, all of you guys are good, too. Now that’s
what I’m talking about!
So you saw that vision too, huh, Minoru?
I did, too... I think we all saw them.
It was terrible... What the heck was that?

It’s like I couldn’t tell my ass from my
elbow in there. Messed with my head big time.
It was probably an enemy attack.

I can’t even... Who knew they could attack
like that?

Did they make you see anything weird, Miu?
How’re you feeling?
I’m okay... You worry too much, Kaito.
Really? For really real?
Uuugh you’re SUCH a pain. I said I’m fine!

Is it just me, or does this waterway keep
changing shape?

Some of these paths weren’t here before, and
others seem to have up and disappeared...
You think it might be the gas doing this?

I don’t wanna see an awful vision like that
ever again...

You got that right. We gotta either get out of
here or do something about the big baddie!
You mean Archnemon, yeah? Still...

*sniff* *sniff*... Shoot, I can’t catch
a whiff of where she is.

In that case, our safest best is finding our
way out of here.

I hate the idea of running with our tails
between our legs, but you ain’t wrong...

The exit is right past here. If our minds are
made up, I suggest we—

Hold on a sec! Is this everybody? Aren’t we
missing a head or two?
Huh? Let’s see...
Oh! Shuuji!

Oh jeez... That guy looked pretty close to
cracking. Hope it ain’t come to that, but...
We have to look for him right now!
Better hurry. Let’s all go together!
